sentences.en: Damping wakes possible finite steady - state vibration amplitude at resonance.
sentences.cn: 在共振时,阻尼可能限制稳定振动的振幅.

sentences.en: Finite personalities are insubstantial fragments of this engulfing spiritual unity.
sentences.cn: 有限的人格是这种兼容并包的精神统一的非实体的碎片.

sentences.en: For finite - dimensional spaces determinants can be brought into play.
sentences.cn: 在有限维空间中可以运用行列式.

sentences.en: Human knowledge is finite , ie There are things we do not know.
Incense can attune the finite to the Infinite .
sentences.cn: 薰香可以使有限调谐至无限。

sentences.en: Only a finite number of situations can arise.
sentences.cn: 只有有限的几种情况可能会发生。

sentences.en: Taylor's exposition based on what we would call finite differences.
sentences.cn: 泰勒的阐述是建立在我们叫作有限差分的基础上的.

sentences.en: The finite element method does not exhaust the possibilities for variational methods.
sentences.cn: 有限单元法不能排除变分法.

sentences.en: The finite size of real particles compounds the difficulty.
sentences.cn: 实际粒子的有限大小增加了困难度.

sentences.en: The foregoing examples suggest some advantages of the finite element method.
sentences.cn: 从上述例子可看出有限单元方法的某些优点.

sentences.en: The fossil fuels (coal and oil) are finite resources.
sentences.cn: 化石燃料（如煤和石油）属于有限资源。

sentences.en: To maintain a logical presentation we start with the simplest finite - difference scheme.
sentences.cn: 为了按逻辑来表达,我们从最简单的有限差分格式开始.

phrases.tran_cn: 有限元模式，有限元模型；有限单元体模式；有限要素模型

trans.tran_en: having an end or a limit
